document_data.name: ''Golden Mirror''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Golden mirrors''''' were magic items that adorned each major stronghold of the [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]].{{Cite dragon/268/Secrets of the Brotherhood of the True Flame}}
document_data.Description: These [[mirror]]s were the same size as a large circular shield. The glass was encircled in a [[gold|golden]] frame.
document_data.Powers: Each ''golden mirror'' was linked with all of the others of its kind, allowing for instant communication between strongholds. Communication was achieved similar to a ''[[crystal ball]]'' with ''[[clairaudience]]'' properties.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: [[Nar-Aidiya]], the Bonfire, owned a special ''golden mirror'' that allowed him to appear wreathed in flames to anyone using a regular ''golden mirror''. The Bonfire's mirror also functioned the same as a ''[[mirror of mental prowess]]'', allowing him to further dominate others.
